fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Befriend 2 players + yourself during the 1st day
-During the night, These players will be invited to a friendgroup private chat with you and the two of them
-every day afterwards; Youll add one more person into the friendgroup
-people in the friendgroup cannot willingly kill other players in the friendgroup at night.

Attributes
-literally cant target the players in the friendgroup with a kill. Everyone in there will be informed of this
- ~~**Part of the Daily streak faction**~~
